traits.Amphibious: The triton can breathe air and water.
traits.Nimble Escape: The triton can take the Disengage or Hide actions as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.Multiattack: The triton makes two urchin-spine shortsword attacks.
actions.Urchin-Spine Shortsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage. If the damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, that creature is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.
actions.Poisoned Spine: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.
